    • check

      public static boolean check(String s)
      Check if a String is significant as parameter value.
      Parameters:
      s - String to test.
      Returns:
      true if significant, false otherwise.

    • cookie

      public String cookie(String name)
      Get a cookie value by name.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the cookie.
      Returns:
      value if cookie set, or null.

      Returns:

      Ensure that a String could be included in an html attribute with quotes.
      Parameters:
      s - source chars.
      Returns:
      escaped String.

    • getBoolean

      public boolean getBoolean(String name, boolean fallback)
      Get a request parameter as a boolean with a default value.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of a request parameter.
      fallback - Default value.
      Returns:
      priority order: request, fallback.

    • getBoolean

      public boolean getBoolean(String name, boolean fallback, String cookie)
      Get a request parameter as a boolean with a default value, and an optional cookie persistence.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of a request parameter.
      fallback - Default value.
      cookie - Name of a cookie.
      Returns:
      priority order: request, cookie, fallback.

    • getEnum

      public Enum<?> getEnum(String name, Enum<?> fallback)
      Get a request parameter as an Enum value that will ensure a closed list of values, with a default value if wrong.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of a request parameter.
      fallback - Default value.
      Returns:
      The value from Enum.

    • getEnum

      public Enum<?> getEnum(String name, Enum<?> fallback, String cookie)
      Get a request parameter as an Enum value that will ensure a closed list of values, with a default value if wrong.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of a request parameter.
      fallback - Default value.
      cookie - Cookie persistency.
      Returns:
      The value from Enum.

    • getFileName

      public static String getFileName(javax.servlet.http.Part part)
      Useful for servlet 3.0 (and not 3.1).
      Parameters:
      part - multipart/form-data
      Returns:
      file name of uploaded file.

      Priority order: request, fallback.

      Parameters:
      name - name of http param.
      fallback - default value.
      cookie - name of a cookie.
      Returns:
      priority order: request, cookie, fallback.

      public int getInt(String name, int fallback, String cookie)
      Get a request parameter as an int with a default value, and a cookie persistence.
      Parameters:
      name - name of an http param.
      fallback - default value.
      cookie - name of a cookie.
      Returns:
      priority order: request, cookie, fallback.

    • getInt

      public int getInt(String name, int[] range, int fallback)
      Get a request parameter as an int with a default value, and a cookie persistence.
      Parameters:
      name - name of an http param.
      range - [min, max].
      fallback - default value.
      Returns:
      priority order: request, fallback.

    • getInt

      public int getInt(String name, int[] range, int fallback, String cookie)
      Get a request parameter as an int with a default value, and a cookie persistence. Value should be included in a range.
      Parameters:
      name - name of an http param.
      range - [min, max].
      fallback - default value.
      cookie - name of a cookie.
      Returns:
      if value in range, priority order: request, cookie, fallback.

    • getIntRange

      public int[] getIntRange(String name, int[] range)
      Get an int Range between a min and a max (included).
      Parameters:
      name - name of an http param.
      range - [min, max].
      Returns:
      [] if no value, [] if at least one value outise [min, max], [point] if 1 value, [lower, upper] if 2 values.

    • getIntSet

      public int[] getIntSet(String name)
      Returns a set of unique int values.
      Parameters:
      name - of an http param.
      Returns:
      array of int values without duplicates.

    • getString

      public String getString(String name, String fallback)
      Get a request parameter as a String with a default value.
      Parameters:
      name - name of an http param.
      fallback - default value.
      Returns:
      priority order: request, fallback.

    • getString

      public String getString(String name, String fallback, Set<String> set)
      Get a request parameter as a String with a default value, or optional cookie persistence. Optional set of accepted values.
      Parameters:
      name - name of http param.
      fallback - default value.
      set - accepted values.
      Returns:
      Priority order: request, fallback.

    • getString

      public String getString(String name, String fallback, Set<String> set, String cookie)
      Get a request parameter as a String with a default value, or optional cookie persistence. Optional set of accepted values.
      Parameters:
      name - name of http param.
      fallback - default value.
      set - accepted values.
      cookie - name of a cookie.
      Returns:
      Priority order: request, cookie, fallback.

    • getStringSet

      public String[] getStringSet(String name)
      Get a repeated parameter as an array of String, filtered of empty strings and repeated values. Original order is kept.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of request parameter
      Returns:
      Null if no plain values

    • queryString

      public String queryString(String[] pars)
      Build a query string from a set of parameters names, values are taken from http request.
      Parameters:
      pars - list of paramter names.
      Returns:
      a query string, ready for a href attribute.
